title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3097/84 of 7 November 1984 fixing for the 1984/85 marketing year the reference prices for cabbage lettuce
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 3097/84
of 7 November 1984
fixing for the 1984/85 marketing year the reference prices for cabbage lettuce
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body:
For the 1984/85 marketing year, the reference prices for cabbage lettuce falling within subheading 07.01 D I of the Common Customs Tariff, expressed in ECU per 100 kilograms net of packed products of class I, of all sizes, shall be as follows:
- from 1 November to 31 December: 63,88
- from 1 January to 28 February: 68,61
- from 1 March to 31 May: 76,65

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 7 November 1984.
For the Commission
Poul DALSAGER
Member of the Commission
